thread.title: SB350 gives electric vehicles a charge
thread.title_full: SB350 gives electric vehicles a charge - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rich Gordon
title: SB350 gives electric vehicles a charge
text:
Photo: ChargePoint Will we see a day when charging stations are as ubiquitous as gas stations? Will we see a day when charging stations are as ubiquitous as gas...
While much of the news coverage of Senate Bill 350 , the landmark climate bill signed into law by the governor Wednesday, focused on how the oil industry stripped the bill’s direct petroleum reductions, less noticed was a section that delivers a big boost for zero-emission vehicles. Electric vehicle provisions in the legislation serve as an alternate, additional and electrifying route toward reducing fossil-fuel dependence and air pollution. Will we see a day when charging stations are as ubiquitous as gas stations? Will we see a day when charging stations are as ubiquitous as gas...
